[b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][b]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/b][size=5][i][u]Como Instalar? / [color=#00ff00]How do Install?[/color]

[u][size=5][b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u]APENAS INSTALAÇAO MANUAL
[b][u][i][b][color=#00ff00][b]ONLY[/b] MANUAL [b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/color][/b][/i][/u][/b][/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/size][/u][size=5]

[/size][b][i][u][size=5]Extraia os arquivos e coloque na pasta DATA e ative pelo NEXUS NMM
[/size][b][i][b][u][i][b][i][b][i][u][color=#00ff00][size=5]Extract the files and place in the DATA folder and enable for NEXUS NMM[/size][/color][/u][/i][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/b][/i][/b][/u][/i][/b]
[b][size=5][u][i][b][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][size=5][i][u][b][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][b]_________________________________________________________________
[/b][size=5][i][u]REQUISITOS / [color=#00ff00]Requiriment [/color][/u][/i][/size][/b][/i][/b]
[color=#ff0000]SKYRIM :v[/color][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/b][/u][/i][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/u][/i][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b]
[b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b]________________________________________________________________
[b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][size=5][u][i]INTRODUÇÃO / [color=#00ff00]INTRODUCTION[/color][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b]

[/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][size=5]Voce tem medo dos manequins de Skyrim? Ja pensou em ter um manequim ao seu lado? Agora voce pode!
O que mais me agrada neste mod [/size][size=5]é as linhas de fogo que deixa o personagem mais "vivo", elas se adaptam a qualquer armadura ou espada!

[color=#00ff00]You are afraid of mannequins Skyrim? Ever thought about having a dummy fighting for you? Now you can!
What I like about this mod is the lines of fire that makes the character more "alive", they adapt to any armor or sword!

[youtube]sxokUaQsYsQ[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/yXkVFqt.gif[/img]
[/color]
[b][i][b][size=5][u][i]Feitiços / [color=#00ff00]Spells[/color][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b]

[/size][size=5]Cura Rapida / [color=#00ff00]Fast Healing[/color]
Reanimar Cadaver / [color=#00ff00]Reanimate Corpse[/color]
Raios / [color=#00ff00]Sparks[/color]
Clone / [color=#00ff00]Clone[/color]
[b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][size=5][u][i][b][i][b][b]__________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[/b][size=5][i][u]Como encontra-lo? / [color=#00ff00]How do I find he?[/color][/u][/i][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b][/i][/u][/size][/b][/i][/b]
[/size]
[size=5]Ele esta localizado em Hamvir's Rest / [color=#00ff00]It is located in Hamvir's Rest[/color][/size][/center]
author: darkmano
